game.title: Frostbound Sisters: The Thawing Quest
game.summary: Embark on a perilous journey through a snowbound kingdom to end an eternal winter caused by an Iceweaver queen's magic gone awry. Join Lyra and Mira, sisters bound by love and duty, as they navigate treacherous terrain, rally allies, and confront fearsome foes to restore balance to the land.
game.world_setting: In the frozen realm of Frosthall, where elemental ice magic reigns supreme, the bond between two sisters holds the key to saving the kingdom from the grasp of eternal winter. Explore icy peaks, ancient ruins, and hidden caverns as you uncover the mysteries of the thawbound forest and face the chilling forces that seek to plunge the world into darkness.

characters.name: Lyra
characters.visual_description: pale blue traveling coat trimmed in frost-silver, white hair in a long braid, crystal gauntlets, soft glow at fingertips
characters.abilities: sculpt ice into bridges, shields, and shards, summon frost gusts

characters.name: Mira
characters.visual_description: russet parka with wool trim, weathered satchel of maps, snow goggles on head, compass necklace
characters.abilities: navigation boosts, quick dodges, rally allies

characters.name: Toren
characters.visual_description: fur-lined jacket, heavy boots with crampons, rope coils and pitons at belt, short dark beard
characters.abilities: climb sheer ice, anchor lines, avalanche stomp

characters.name: Tink
characters.visual_description: bronze-and-ice body plates, glowing core, round glass eyes, detachable twig-like arm extensions
characters.abilities: warmth pulses that melt small ice, lantern-bright light, whirr-dash

characters.name: Matron Ilva
characters.visual_description: layered wool robes, runic shawl, ashwood staff tipped with a chime that rings in the wind
characters.abilities: lore divination, wind wards, slow-time chant

characters.name: The Thawbound
characters.visual_description: verdant antlered mask, bark-and-vine armor, frost-bitten green cloak

items.name: Hearthcrystal Shard
items.description: A fragment of pure warmth and light, imbued with ancient magic. Used to power clockwork mechanisms and dispel ice enchantments.

items.name: Spectral Compass
items.description: A magical device that points towards hidden pathways and reveals ethereal beings. Essential for navigating ghostly realms.

items.name: Frostbloom Elixir
items.description: A potion brewed from rare flowers that grants temporary resistance to ice magic. Vital for surviving frozen encounters.

enemies.name: Blizzard Wolf Pack
enemies.description: Swift and ferocious wolves adapted to the icy tundra. Hunt in packs to overwhelm their prey with frostbite.

enemies.name: Frozen Specter
enemies.description: Ghostly apparitions trapped in eternal winter. Drains warmth and hope from travelers lost in the snow.

enemies.name: Frostfire Elemental
enemies.description: Living conflagrations of ice and fire. Unleash bursts of freezing flames to incinerate anything in their path.

enemies.name: Corrupted Thornfang
enemies.description: Once noble forest guardians transformed by dark magic. Lash out with thorny vines and poisoned thorns.

enemies.name: Soulchill Wraith
enemies.description: Haunting spirits of those consumed by the winter's cold. Freeze the very essence of life with icy touches.

enemies.name: Ethereal Echo
enemies.description: Manifestations of forgotten memories bound to the Heart of Frostfall. Twist reality and mirror the past to confuse intruders.

characters.name: Eira
characters.visual_description: Icy blue robes adorned with snowflake runes, frost-covered staff emanating a chill mist, crystalline tiara on silver hair

characters.name: Bjorn
characters.visual_description: Tattered fur cloak lined with icicles, massive ice-encrusted battle axe, piercing blue eyes under a snow-laden helm

characters.name: Astra
characters.visual_description: Flowing silver gown embroidered with shimmering stars, halo of glowing ice crystals, gentle aura of warmth and light

characters.name: Rune
characters.visual_description: Carved ice armor etched with intricate runes, towering ice halberd crackling with power, eyes glowing with ancient wisdom

characters.name: Kaida
characters.visual_description: Sleek blue and white stealth suit, twin ice daggers shimmering with frost, snow fox companion at her side

dialogue.speaker: Lyra
dialogue.line: The blizzard... It started with me. I must fix this.

dialogue.speaker: Mira
dialogue.line: I won't let you face this alone, sister. We'll end this winter together.

dialogue.speaker: Toren
dialogue.line: The lands are frozen, but our spirits remain unbroken. Let's find a way.

dialogue.speaker: Matron Ilva
dialogue.line: The ice whispers secrets of the past. Listen closely, for the answers lie within.

dialogue.speaker: Tink
dialogue.line: Beep-boop! Secrets detected! Let's unravel this frosty mystery.

dialogue.speaker: Toren
dialogue.line: Fire and ice clash in the heart of the mountain. We must tread carefully.

dialogue.speaker: The Thawbound
dialogue.line: You dare challenge the might of winter itself? Prepare for your end.

dialogue.speaker: Mira
dialogue.line: The forest mourns its corruption. We'll bring light back to its darkest corners.

dialogue.speaker: Corrupted Thornfang
dialogue.line: You trespass on cursed ground, intruders. Prepare to face nature's wrath.

dialogue.speaker: Lyra
dialogue.line: The Iceweaver's power must be balanced. I accept my fate, for the kingdom's sake.

dialogue.speaker: The Thawbound
dialogue.line: Defy me, and you'll witness true winter's grip. Submit, and perhaps I'll spare you.

skills.name: Frostweave Mastery
skills.effect: Increase damage and duration of ice-based abilities

skills.name: Glacial Resilience
skills.effect: Enhance resistance to chilling effects and environmental hazards

skills.name: Icicle Storm
skills.effect: Unleash a devastating hail of ice shards on enemies

skills.name: Cartographer's Insight
skills.effect: Reveal hidden pathways and shortcuts on the map

skills.name: Wayfinder's Blessing
skills.effect: Boost movement speed and agility for faster exploration

skills.name: Ice Climber
skills.effect: Scale vertical ice surfaces with ease

skills.name: Avalanche Mastery
skills.effect: Control and redirect avalanches as a tactical advantage

items.name: Frostbite Blade
items.description: A sword forged from enchanted ice crystals, capable of freezing enemies on contact.

items.name: Blizzard Bow
items.description: A bow crafted from the heartwood of ancient frostbloom trees, shoots arrows that create icy whirlwinds.

items.name: Thawing Torch
items.description: A magical torch fueled by hearthcrystal shards, emits warm light that dispels cold illusions.

items.name: Glacial Gauntlets
items.description: Metal gloves infused with icy power, allow the wearer to unleash frost shockwaves with each punch.

items.title: The Frozen Awakening
items.description: Lyra discovers the source of the blizzard while Mira pledges her support, and Toren vows to find a solution.
